TopicTitle: Extracting xxx fresh ore from celestialbodyX

Articles.Content:
Hello.

I already had a mining rig set up on Minmus.

I took the contract.

I stopped my drill, converted all the ore into fuel, so the tank was 0/1500.

I then drilled another 1500.

I tried jetison the ore to become 0/1500 and filled it up again.

In the contract it does not say I have to bring it to Kerbin.

Also, do I have to send another drill ? (That's insane!)
